definitions.body: :De 19:5 iron (c. [[ל]] afform.; fr. piercing ? NH id., Aram. id., [[פַּדְזֶל]], parzlo0, Ph. [[ברזל]], As. parzillu COT:Gloss, (Ar. firzilun fetter is loan-word))—alw. abs. ´[[ב]] Ge 4:22 + 74 t. ([[בַּרְזֶלָ]] Ge 4:22 etc.);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: iron-ore, stone containing iron, De 8:9, Job 28:2;

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: as article of commerce Ez Eze 27:12, Eze 27:19;

tool of iron De 27:5, Jos 8:31, Pr 27:17, Pr 27:17, Ec 10:10, Is 10:34 (metaph.); head of an axe De 19:5, 2Ki 6:5, 2Ki 6:6; so weapon 2Sa 23:7, Job 41:19; cf. also Nu 31:22, Jos 22:8 where iron as spoil of war.

iron in fig. of unwatered earth De 28:23; of Egyptian bondage, ´[[כּוּר הַבּ]] De 4:20, 1Ki 8:51, Je 11:4, of oppression ´[[עׂל ב]] De 28:48, Je 28:14 cf. v:Je 28:13; of strength Je 15:12, Je 15:12; cf. [[מִנְעָלֶיךָ]] ´[[ב]] De 33:25 & Mic 4:13 ´[[קֶרֶן ב]]; of prophet, firm through Yahweh's might, [[עַמּוּד]] ´[[ב]] Je 1:18; of distress, ´[[בְּרִיחֵי ב]] Ps 107:16 cf. v:Ps 107:10 of judgments of ´[[י]], & Ps 105:18; ´[[שֵׁבֶט ב]] Ps 2:9; of evil-doers, Je 6:28, Ez Eze 22:18, Eze 22:20; simile of scorching sky Le 26:19; ´[[מְטִיל ב]] of bones of hippopotamus Job 40:18; ´[[גִּיד ב]] of obstinate neck of Isr.
